title: Add Copy Raw button to AI console for full output including base64
description: Add a second "Copy Raw" button to the AI console that copies all raw output including base64 encoded data. Keep the existing formatted copy button for readable output. Users can choose which version they want.

title: Add Copy Raw button with full unformatted output to AIProgressPanel
AI Thinking Overlay - Show intermediate images with pulsing effect during iterations
description: When the AI is in reference mode and iterating through candidate images, show each intermediate result as a semi-transparent pulsing overlay on the canvas. This gives users visual feedback that the AI is "thinking" and lets them see the spatial alignment of generated content. The pulsing animation makes it unmistakably "work in progress".

title: Add thinking image state to AIProgressContext
Create ThinkingOverlay component with pulsing animation
Integrate ThinkingOverlay into canvas and wire up iteration images
Fix ThinkingOverlay bugs and add Apple Intelligence-style gradient border
description: Fix issues with the ThinkingOverlay: 1) Border never pulsed, 2) "AI Thinking" label stayed after completion. Replace with Apple Intelligence-style animated rainbow/prismatic gradient border that rotates around the canvas edge.

title: Fix ThinkingOverlay - replace with Apple Intelligence gradient border animation
Fix ThinkingOverlay - remove white background, fix status clearing
description: Issues: 1) White rectangle covering canvas - the ::before pseudo-element has background: #fafafa blocking the view. Should be transparent. 2) Border stayed glowing after completion - thinkingStatus not clearing when AI process ends. 3) Glow scope wrong - should start on command execution and end when ENTIRE process completes, not per-iteration.

title: Add interim image overlay and shimmer particles to ThinkingOverlay
description: 1) Restore semi-transparent interim images showing on top of canvas during AI iterations. 2) Add subtle animated shimmer/sparkle particles floating across the canvas surface for magical effect.

title: Fix ThinkingOverlay positioning and add debug logging
description: The ThinkingOverlay (image and particles) aren't showing. Issues: 1) The container div needs position:relative for absolute children to work. 2) Need debug logging to verify thinkingStatus and thinkingImage are being set.

title: Extract AI services to Express backend (Phase 1)
description: Move client-side Gemini API calls to an Express + TypeScript backend. Create proxy endpoints that hide API keys while maintaining the same functionality. Structure API for future Python/LangGraph replacement. Keep Google OAuth client-side.

title: Create Express server foundation with TypeScript and shared types
Implement core AI proxy endpoint with Gemini SDK
Add image generation and inpainting endpoints
Add SSE streaming endpoint for agentic operations
Create integration tests for API contract
Create client API adapter layer
Wire client services to use API adapter
Fix SSE client to use POST instead of query params for large payloads
description: HTTP 431 error occurs when calling /api/ai/agentic/edit because base64 images are sent in URL query params. Need to use fetch() with POST body and streaming instead of EventSource which only supports GET.

title: Fix SSE client to handle comments and empty data events
description: SSE client throws "Failed to parse SSE event data" because it tries to JSON.parse empty strings. Server sends `: SSE stream initialized` comment which has no data field. Client should skip comments and events without data.

title: Replace custom implementations with standard libraries
description: Refactor to use battle-tested npm libraries instead of custom implementations: @microsoft/fetch-event-source for SSE, zod for validation, ky for HTTP client.

title: Replace custom SSE client with @microsoft/fetch-event-source
Add zod validation to server routes
Replace fetch wrappers with ky in client
Fix ky prefixUrl path handling - remove leading slashes from endpoints
description: ky ignores prefixUrl when the path starts with /. API_ENDPOINTS have leading slashes which breaks the calls. Either remove leading / from API_ENDPOINTS in apiConfig.ts OR strip them in apiClient.ts before calling ky.

title: Implement incremental thinkingTextDelta for SSE streaming
description: Fix SSE text overwriting by switching from full text replacement to incremental deltas. Server sends thinkingTextDelta with new chars only, client appends to existing text.

title: Update AIProgressEvent types (server + client)
Update server agenticService to send incremental deltas
Update AIProgressContext to handle thinkingTextDelta
Add POLYGON enum and toolbar button
Add streaming to self-check phase in agenticService
description: Change selfCheck function to use gemini.callStream() instead of gemini.call() so thinking text streams during self-check phase. Need to track previousThinkingLength separately for the self-check phase.

title: Inline Editable Interpretation in MoveConfirmationDialog
description: Replace the readonly interpretation text with an editable textarea that allows users to modify the AI's interpretation and replan without leaving the confirmation dialog

title: Polygon Selection Tool for AI Manipulation Mode
description: Add click-to-add-vertices polygon selection tool to generative fill. Users click to place vertices, double-click or click near start to close. Complements existing brush/rectangle/lasso tools.

title: Implement polygon event handlers in DrawingLayer
Render polygon selection in SelectionOverlay
Integrate polygon with mask generation and completion flow
Add editable interpretation UI to MoveConfirmationDialog
Wire up replan handler in App.tsx
